Top Places to visit in Kheda, Nadiad, Gujarat
content: Kheda, also known as Kaira, is a city and a municipality in the Indian state of Gujarat. It was the former administrative capital of Kheda district. Kheda city is famous for Tobacco Farming. title: Top Places to visit in Kutch, Bhuj, Gujarat
content: Kutch district is a district of Gujarat state in western India. Covering an area of 45,674 km², it is the largest district of India. The population of Kutch is about 2,092,000.
